entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 23. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Otherwise clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 15 February 2023
